requirements.summary: Add JobPosting JSON-LD structured data markup to the Careers page for search engine indexing
acceptanceCriteria: A <script type='application/ld+json'> tag containing a valid schema.org/JobPosting object is rendered in the CareersPage component.
No other files are modified â€” backend, other pages, components, hooks, and styles remain unchanged.
The structured data validates against schema.org/JobPosting requirements (hiringOrganization, title, datePosted, jobLocation or applicantLocationRequirements).

file_operations.description: Inject a <script type='application/ld+json'> block containing schema.org/JobPosting structured data into the CareersPage component. The JSON-LD must include required properties: hiringOrganization (with name, sameAs, logo), jobPosting array with at least one posting containing title, datePosted, description, employmentType, jobLocation (with address details including addressLocality, addressRegion, addressCountry), and applicantLocationRequirements if remote work is supported. Use Supreme LTL/Supreme Trucking Group as the organization name, maintain consistency with existing contact information (201.838.0000, address), and ensure the markup is valid JSON-LD that search engines can parse.
